korean: 어떤 걸 살까 한 시간 동안 고민했는데 결국 생필품만 샀다.
쿠폰 덕분에 만원 정도 아낀 것 같아서 기분이 좋다.
다음에 또 쿠폰이 들어오면 바로 써야지.
english: Today is the day to use the coupons I've been saving up.
I spent an hour thinking about what to buy, but ended up just getting essentials.
I feel good because I saved about 10,000 won thanks to the coupons.
Next time I get coupons, I'll use them right away.
